website_summaries.verdict: A safe culinary torch that's easy for beginners to use and gives the precise flame control more advanced chefs want.
pros: Safety lock to prevent accidental use or butane leakage
Flow regulator dial gives you precise control over the size of the flame
Will not leak or break down
cons: Some users have had problems getting the torch to light

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable handling and great for acrylic projects!
customer_reviews.text: I use the Torch for acrylic pour projects. Have had excellent results so far.
customer_reviews.author: bev

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tool
customer_reviews.text: I am having a problem with the one that was shipped to me but when I was contacted within a day of my reaching out, I had a resolution to my problem with a new one on the way. I would say that is great customer service. The lighting issue they believe is due to the flint that moved during shipping. I can make it come on with extra clicks - and when I have used it, I LOVE IT! It is light weight and does a great job. Looking forward to using this on my art projects for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Janet C. Tapply

customer_reviews.title: Best way to fill and refill for maximum usage
customer_reviews.text: Depending on where you live it's possible that filling and refilling this torch (like refillable lighters) won't run very long. My trick is to place the torch, or lighter, in the freezer for an hour prior to filling with butane. The gas, at room temperature, will fill the cold torch or lighter to it's maximum capacity. Simple science, not magic!
customer_reviews.author: TeacherMac

customer_reviews.title: Great for plumbing repairs!
customer_reviews.text: Love this torch. I’m sure it would work great for scorching food in the kitchen, but I didn’t buy it for that. I keep one in my truck for repairing copper plumbing. As a remodeling carpenter, I’ve had pipes get cut, or punctured. When that happens (and it will), I can fix or seal the pipe, instead of waiting for the plumber. It takes up less room than my propane torch, and if I need fuel, I can get it at any convenience store.
customer_reviews.author: CDC

customer_reviews.title: Easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: Are use this in my art and it works every time. It takes only 10 seconds to fill it up. Easy to operate. I am 75 and I can do it easily. I highly recommend this torch
customer_reviews.author: karrol

customer_reviews.title: Good Torch
customer_reviews.text: I use it mainly in the garage for wiring jobs (solder & heatshrink) I've used it for some small wood burning projects, also. Sturdy and not overly bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Takes a couple clicks to get it to light, but it will light and is easy to use. Easy to fill as well - but now I wish I got the one with the fuel window so I know how much is left.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Best item for the use/cost ratio
customer_reviews.text: I bought another brand about a year ago and it stopped working after just a few uses. So I have another car audio project on my hands and did a fair amount of research before picking this item up. I decided early on that I was not going to get the best torch on the market, because I use so rarely. However, I also wanted something that would fill easily, start every time, and had basic security on the butane. I am very happy with this item to date. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Dave J

customer_reviews.title: Excellent kitchen tool
customer_reviews.text: The idea of using a torch on food always has given me pause, and I waited quite awhile to do so. Finally, I purchased the Eurkitchen model seen here. I am happy to note that it is easy and safe to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well, and fuel lasts
customer_reviews.text: According to the package, the fully fueled torch last an hour. So far so good, I got it and knocked out 6 Pumpkin crème brûlée with a nice candy coating with no problem. Going to take a lot of deserts to empty the fuel. Has a safety lock, and easy on and off, quick starting, although it's my first torch, I am sure it will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: john W

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use on my creme brulee. It was easy to use but it has to be made clear that you have to buy the butane at your local store since it can't be shipped to you. I had no problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: La Quinta  Lindy

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with my acrylic flow art . I have used it for 4-5 months with no issues. Mine does not have a gas gauge but it has not be an issue for me. Only takes about 10 seconds to refill. Make sure you valve is in the off position, turn the torch upside down and insert the nozzle from the gas can into the hole on the bottom. Count to 10 and your filled again.
customer_reviews.author: Renona J.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I have used several of the more expensive brands for my jewelry making, but absolutely love this one! Easy on, flame easy to adjust, filling is a snap. Nice weight with stand. Very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: cookenup

customer_reviews.title: A great torch with easy flame adjustments.
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to use. Refilling is easy. I like to cook in my electric pressure cooker. Meats takes wonderful but without the torch, it would be a grey color when plating. The torch makes everything easy to give a nice roasted appearance. No problems so far and I would recommend purchase.
customer_reviews.author: cw410

customer_reviews.title: It has a nice flame to it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great torch. I've had 3 others and they've all been rather weak flamed, but this one has a very strong flame and was easy to fill and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Belle Esprit

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly for my paintings!
customer_reviews.text: Works just as expected, one butane fill seems to last a really long time, consistency of flame is fine. I like the safety guard and you can't beat the price for its quality. The shipping was also perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Anastassia

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 5 uses.  The gas valve does not close.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for caramelizing sugar on creme brulee. On my first serving of my second batch of creme brulee, which is 5 FIVE small servings, 6 oz. The gas valve stopped closing, talk about a safety hazard... Afer closing the valve the thing wouldn't go out. And after blowing the flame out you could still hear gas escaping. Long story short don't buy this thing. To replace it I just got the Rosle torch and WHAT a difference. The valve is much better, the construction is metal, so the whole feel and weight are different And most importantly the gas valve works.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher A Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy lighting!!
customer_reviews.text: What I like the most is the strength of the flame.it is quick and easy for my needs.It also made lighting the 101 candles on my friends Grandmothers birthday cake,a breeze !!LOL The thing I like the least, is the actual grip.Although,my hands have weakened with age,and most EVERYTHING I grasp causes a little pain.The butane seems to last forever and the torch is very easy to fill!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: This thing packs some SERIOUS power. LOVE LOVE LOVE. As long as it keeps working the way it has been- this is a must have for anyone who loves to cook and bake. Perfect for Creme Brulee
customer_reviews.author: Kassandra Espinosa

customer_reviews.title: Wicked fun torch I bought to make creme brulee
customer_reviews.text: Wicked fun torch I bought to make creme brulee! It doesn't come with fuel, but luckily the bodega on my block sells butane refills, and it was super easy to refill.
customer_reviews.author: PlusMinus

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.text: First one had an issue. Replacement was sent priority and works as expected. A safety trigger would be nice but able to safely use it in my kitchen to flame roast peppers. Replacement managed directly by third party seller by responding to their email.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this torch specifically to roast marshmallows on a decorated cake. It worked perfectly. I can hardly wait to use it again in the future. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Pencil & Paper

customer_reviews.title: Hated It
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kitchen torch and it's never worked appropriately. I always had trouble igniting it. And, just today, once I got it to burn it would not turn off. I had to stand in the kitchen and hold the thing till the fuel ran out. It didn't cost a lot and I got what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: MF

customer_reviews.title: This is so easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy to use. I bought it mainly to get bubbles out of resin, but yesterday I was roasting anaheim peppers and there is always that little part left unblistered. I tried my torch and it blistered perfectly. Now I like it even more. I do wish there was a fuel window, but it isn't the end of the world.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Gold piece where the flame comes out randomly fell out
customer_reviews.text: Gold piece where the flame comes out randomly fell out It worked fine for a year. I never dropped it, used probably 10 times. Went to use it and it just fell out. Willing to work the the seller if they want me to change back to a positive review. Edit - could never get a hold of the seller. Now the thing is $10 more. Will find any other brand.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Gas leak and Plastic cracking!
customer_reviews.text: sososo disappointed me! gas leaking after refill, even i turn off still flame out and uncontrollable ( the flame size can't be adjusted). also the plastic base is cracked with no reason!
customer_reviews.author: poor quality of the torch

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Edit: Originally I wrote a nasty review about how this product showed up defective....turns out it was the butane filler I had that was broken, not the torch. Product works great now, thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Poole

customer_reviews.title: HUGE flame, AWESOME customer service
customer_reviews.text: I had a small problem with the first torch, but Rohego were AWESOME and FAST about responding. Other than the spring coming off at first, this is a great torch. Id recommended this torch and this company
customer_reviews.author: Derek B

customer_reviews.title: My only issue is the "safety" is a little hard for me
customer_reviews.text: I both like and hate the safety lock. My cheaper torch does not have one, but also has no base so fell over HOT a lot. This has base, my only requirement. Besides price. The safety is difficult for me to undo due to my right hand doesn't work for a darn. (hence the base. I can't hold and use, need it to stay put) Other than that it works just fine after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Lexy B.

customer_reviews.title: Not only is this product a great value for the price it is packaged great - ...
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this product a great value for the price it is packaged great - has detailed instructions and is light weight. Highly recommend purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great torch, have used daily without a single issue
customer_reviews.text: great torch, have used daily without a single issue... though make sure to use a good fuel, I got zippo fuel at first for it thinking that would be a good brand... caused the torch to sputter and have issues lighting... at first I thought it was the torch, but bled the fuel and got a new brand and the torch was 100% what I was expecting/hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Mizrach

customer_reviews.title: be carefull when first igniting it it can throw a pretty big flame if the gas is up too high
customer_reviews.text: its nice the way you can set it at whatever level of flame you want and not have to constantly be holding a button down .also less chance of having an accident because you dont have to get too close to the flame.
customer_reviews.author: charity ivie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use for a first timer.
customer_reviews.text: Love this torch. This is my first time ever buying or using a cooking torch. I made smore cupcakes with toasted marshmallow frosting. It was so easy to use and fill with butane. The safety features work great. I saw some reviews that the knob didnt turn off the torch or the tip was hot. The tip cooled off after only a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is on point!
customer_reviews.text: Initially, I got a torch and it did not work after a short period of time. They reached out to me after I wrote a review (they didn’t have to do this) and offered a brand new one to me at no cost. I received the new torch and it has worked perfectly. I am not only now happy with their product, but super impressed with their customer service. If I ever need another one, I will be using their company.
customer_reviews.author: Jcaballero0725

customer_reviews.title: Nice Multi-Purpose Tool
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t use initially this in the traditional way on food, but instead on some stray grass clumps in my yard. Worked like a charm. It burned up the grass beautifully while giving me full control of what I was aiming at without burning any fingers. It was a quick task. Now that the yard task is done, I’ll definitely use this on some of the desserts I make. Win-win! Also, the safety catch is great if there are little ones in the house. While it’s super easy to release with adult fingers, it’s hard for little fingers to figure out.
customer_reviews.author: AVT

customer_reviews.title: The perfect gift for the chef that has it all, almost.
customer_reviews.text: I surprised my wife with this torch for a holiday present. She had been wanting one for quite some time. She's fired up now! Absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: ImJustSayin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent investment for any hobby/extracurricular activity.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used a variety of different torches over the years for cooking and dabs. This particular torch will stand on its own, has a finger guard so you don’t burn yourself, and has a safety switch that’s easy to disengage before lighting. The flame on this can get huge and the consumption of butane is minimal. Overall this is a great torch that can be used for a variety of applications. I’m hoping it continues to work for many years, if not I hope the company still carries this particular model of torch.
customer_reviews.author: Billa

customer_reviews.title: Decent torch for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good torch. Similar control to the torches we use in the restaurant, but perfect size for home use. It’s not for amateurs, though. If you don’t control the flame just right you will burn whatever you’re cooking, and the high flame can cause some fat to splatter if you hold it too close. It’s hard to know how much gas is inside. There’s an option for a torch with a window that shows how much gas, but after a while you’ll get a feel for when it’s getting a little empty. It’ll feel a little lighter. Overall great, just four stars because the safety mechanism is a little clunky. Would recommend buying.
customer_reviews.author: Adithya Srikanthan

customer_reviews.title: Great All Around
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for use in my arts/crafts/DIY, honestly. Needed a torch that wasn't quite the power of what you'd find in home improvement stores, but something more than a small butane lighter. It's worked well in a couple of endeavors including wood burning and resin work. Great customer service as well! Would purchase again and recommend others try for themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Good product for price, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I originally left a not so great review and said customer service didnt get back to me, but it turns out I didnt see the email. The issue I had was needing to turn the gas regulator on high and lighting it, then turning after turning it off the subsequent uses you dont have to open to regulator fully. The torch works well enough for what I need it for now that I dont have to put it on full blast every time. Customer service with this company is outstanding as well.
customer_reviews.author: M_Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Can’t find butane fuel tank with the right nozzle to fit this
customer_reviews.text: Having a hard time finding gas to fit this. I bought a tank of Coleman butane fuel and the nozzle is not tall enough to fit into the torch. I’m going to email the distributor to see what I’m supposed to buy. I haven’t been able to use yet. The torch seems very high-quality. I would’ve given it five stars if the information about propane Would have been more clear.
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful kitchen torch
customer_reviews.text: It works like a dream, perfect control and flame at any angle. So easy to use that it doesn't need directions (just remember righty tighty to close gas, lefty loosy to turn gas on). Pull the trigger to light, turn knob to adjust flame. I absolutely love it. I highly recommend it for beginners or professional chefs. I have had a wonderful experience with this company and this product.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Thought I was going to need an expensive torch but this works. Very fuel-efficient and fills cleanly and quickly with Newport butane. Better than the generic silver ones you see everywhere - and I know because we have one. The only reason I’d recommend something with a toggle trigger is if you have dexterity problems.
customer_reviews.author: Hexspa

customer_reviews.title: decent, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use right out the box, you can easily attach Butane a can to it without much of a hassle. The size is big enough for you to get a good grip on it. One problem I did encounter was the flame not coming out consistently. Maybe it's because it's brand new and still needs more use, but other than that it's a good kitchen torch.
customer_reviews.author: W.L.

customer_reviews.title: Well built and easy to use torch!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for making 3 creme brulee servings yesterday. I can't really comment on long term usage but so far this product has been amazing and appears to be very well built. I like that it's very easy to use and that you do not need an external source to ignite the torch. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Ziv S

customer_reviews.title: inconsistent flame
customer_reviews.text: The one I received appeared to work at first, then the third time I used it the flame kept shrinking down by itself. Every time I turn it on this happens. I need to keep turning it up in increments to finish the job. Makes me wonder how safe it is if the control knob doesn't work right.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: not for professional use, good for home use
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for what it is. Don't turn the flame up too far or you lose the blue flame and it turns into a flame thrower and I wouldn't use it professionally but for home use it's torching my brulee nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse K.

customer_reviews.title: Great for resin art
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I use it for my resin and it works perfectly, it’s great to create the lacing effect on resin. The adjustment knob is so easy to use and get the flame just where you want it. It’s easy to fill up as well. Definitely worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Safe but hard to light
customer_reviews.text: After I got this torch, I seldom use it. Finally I got to use it a few times for my cooking. The big problem of this torch is it's hard to light it up. At first I though it needs more gas but it has plenty. Have to try a few times to light it up...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great safety features and very user friendly
customer_reviews.text: This is a great torch. It works well, is easy to refill, and includes a heat shield for your hand. The butane dial has a safety that locks when it is turned off, so it can not accidentally be turned on.
customer_reviews.author: Bobert

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy! Horrible!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy!!!!! I can’t get it to work. I fill it up and it lasts about two seconds if I can get it to work at all!
customer_reviews.author: lovemyamazon

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I use this for lighting my smoke tube for my pellet grill cooking. It does the job pretty well, unless you need to lean it at an angle. Then it has trouble staying lit. With a little moving things around, it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: I'd say it's okay for some kind of usage
customer_reviews.text: If you want to use it for up 30 seconds it's going to work fine, but then it's going to overheat the and lose power. Also the tank size is relatively small if you want to make a nice crust on a 18oz steak you better be ready to refill it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Addition to My Kitchen Implements
customer_reviews.text: This product will take my culinary skills to another level. It is well made and easy to use. There are many similar torches to choose from. You can't go wrong if you select this one. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Vernon Eng

customer_reviews.title: Great product for culinary and crafty bars !!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking and functional torch. I manage a bar and I use it for craft cocktails. Is impecable, professional looking and does the job like a pro. Great product !!!
customer_reviews.author: MA

customer_reviews.title: Pizzo Doesn't Work!
customer_reviews.text: Received the item, filled it up and....Doesn't work. Will not light on its own. Disappointing but not worth the aggravation of returning. Will work if you light it with a match. Looks like quality but not so much...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ignition doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: Ignition button takes many tries to ignite. I often use a match or lighter ignite torch. This has been the case from first opening and several uses after.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Culinary Torch
customer_reviews.text: It's difficult to start. It has to be in just the right spot or you can click and click and it won't ignite. After I get it started, it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: EuroKitchen Culinary Butane Torch
customer_reviews.text: I have not as yet used it to sear meat but I did have a problem with my charcoal bbq the other day and a small flame out - instead of trying to light with more fuel I simply used this torch - easy fill and start - great flame to restart bbq - would recommend this product, and if mine ever goes bad or I break it in some way - I will not hesitate to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth L. Kurtz

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Overall, nice... but if you’re going with this brand, buy the one with the fuel gauge... this goes through gas quickly, but does a nice job ... regulator isn’t as accurate as I would like
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Best torch I've used
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a couple of torches for popping bubbles on my epoxy. This is by far my favorite. Easy to control the flame, not too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah D Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Great torch
customer_reviews.text: I love this little torch. It is easy to light and it does the job in quick fashion. I have always wanted a kitchen torch and I am so happy I finally bought one.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Mauzy-Fieser

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed by their customer service. I got an email after I got my order but didn't use it right away. Once I got my butane and filled it up, it wouldn't ignite but I was able to use it still by manually lighting it. Complained about and they replaced it right away. This little thing can do a lot of stuff. I can blacken my favorite without burning it and my daughter made her first creme bruIee perfectly. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Gener_A

customer_reviews.title: A little scary
customer_reviews.text: Works great, fires right up, good grip. My issue is, once you get it going it is on even if dropped into a pot of oil. Do they all work this way?
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Fleck

customer_reviews.title: Hot torch
customer_reviews.text: Works splendidly. I use to sear different kinds of meats, drip butter onto things and render fats. I haven't tried for crème brûlée yet but I want to. Only criticism would be its hard to gage if you're putting your Butane in right. Sometimes I go to fill it and it seemingly lasts forever and others I'm needing to refill before finishing searing one item.
customer_reviews.author: Colby Alan Weikel

customer_reviews.title: Not highly impressive, but does well when dial turned up in higher settings.
customer_reviews.text: Item does not stay lit at odd angles, nor does it stay lit at lower serttings...it needs to be in med-high to high setting to stay lit. Having said that, it works well under the said condition. It is lighter and "feels" less durable than others I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher P. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Igniter switch broke after three or four clicks.
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this and the igniter switch broke after three or four uses. Instead of sending it back I just took it apart and fixed it, but you should not have to do this on something brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: EXCEPTIONAL SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, i have not try it again, but i can say that i am not worried at all. Since i received the torch, the company wrote me twice just to ask if i am satisfy. This is the first company since i do not remember when who cares for their customers! I feel in good hands with them!
customer_reviews.author: Zozo10

customer_reviews.title: Love it, very powerful, but clicker broke
customer_reviews.text: This is a great torch, works very well and the flame is powerful. It doesn’t leak butane. However, after about a year of regular use, the ignition clicker broke. I now have to light it with an external lighter. Aside from that, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: First time use was to char an onion for my oxtail consomme, instead of fired up the BBQ or using the mini-oven (the oven had a baiser job to finish). Easy to hold and use. Switches off automatically when the nozzle is too close to the item to char. I like it, so far.
customer_reviews.author: Peterle

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this recently and the first one that arrived didn't work properly, some kind of issue with the gas regulator. Talked to customer service who got back to me super quickly and sent out a new one immediately. Now that I have a working one I can say it does a great job, big and steady flame, very easy to use. Thanks seller!
customer_reviews.author: BikeTrash

customer_reviews.title: Not good for anything.
customer_reviews.text: This is garbage. Works for about 10 seconds before having to fill again. Literally hot garbage. Useless.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Williford

customer_reviews.title: Amazing performance, safe, easy to use and brings some excitement to the kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: Love this torch! I have always loved creme brulee and only recently decided to try and make it for myself so I could put my own spin on it and make it just how I wanted it. I am, of course, a huge fan of a thick crust. This torch made the PERFECT creme brulee, i have used it almost everyday and would not change a thing. I highly recommend this torch. Im starting to dabble with searing fish after i use my sous vide and have been extremely impressed. Wonderful product
customer_reviews.author: MAR

customer_reviews.title: Broke Within Months
customer_reviews.text: Works great, however after only 4 months of owning it, it will no longer self ignite. Gas will come out, but ignitor doesn't work. Going to have to toss it since lighting it an alternative way would be dangerous. Ordered it in late May and at the beginning of September it was already done.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great for Quartz Bangers
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels great, torch itself works magnificently. Using it to heat up Quartz Bangers.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Simple, easy to use. Self-contained butane port - I only wish the operation wasn't counter-clockwise, but that's okay.
customer_reviews.author: Kmmille2

customer_reviews.title: Great product + Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Product does great job of producing steady flame & providing consistent sear (once you get the hang of it). Very convenient item to have for various cooking tasks (sous vide for me) and easy to store. Did have to claim the warranty on my first one, but they were extremely helpful and very nice about everything. It might have been the mail service that caused the damage, but still super satisfied with the product!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Brown

customer_reviews.title: Flame not consistent.
customer_reviews.text: Buy will light this and have a nice flame going then within about 15 seconds the flame will slowly go smaller. Having to keep adjusting the flame up. Tried it with several different gases does the samething.
customer_reviews.author: WPCJ

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use; used it on corn on the cob to give it a burn flavor; also on chicken does really good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: This is weird to use and the button can get stuck mine blew up one me
customer_reviews.author: Roni

customer_reviews.title: Arrived ahead of time.  Looks good
customer_reviews.text: It arrived intact, looks great. Unfortunately although I am excited to try it on my creme brûlée I haven’t been able to find butane. I assume this is because if the general lack of any supplies, thanks to covid19
customer_reviews.author: Eliseo Medrano

customer_reviews.title: Great Torch
customer_reviews.text: Jest received this torch, it was very easy to fill with the propane tank. It lit the first time I tried it as the instructions are clear and easy to follow. The flame is adjustable and it is continuous, it stay on until you turn it off. I would recommend this product/
customer_reviews.author: G. McGrath

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: My arthritis makes it hard to use, but it is not a fault in the gadget. So if you have joints that trouble you, this may be too much work. But otherwise it is fine and works as described.
customer_reviews.author: Mothra

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I have had bad luck buying torches on Amazon but so far this one is working well. It lights easily fuel does not leak out of it like most torches on here. I will see if it stands the test of time and update.
customer_reviews.author: cpyne007

customer_reviews.title: Great for Making creme brûlée
customer_reviews.text: Great torch! I used I for making creme brûlée for the first time and it was easy to use and to fill the butane as well.
customer_reviews.author: Julieannasworld

customer_reviews.title: Works great for Creme Brulee
customer_reviews.text: Love this kitchen torch! My friend and i cannot make a perfect topping for our creme brulee without it. In fact, we used it last night to perfect our creme brulee. Worked perfectly to carmelize the sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Hollywood7255

customer_reviews.title: Product works great! The safety features are clear
customer_reviews.text: Product works great! The safety features are clear, it was easy to fill, and the torch browned my meringue perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca L.

customer_reviews.title: lights easily
customer_reviews.text: works well with some safety features built into it. Great for smoked old fashions with cedar planks.
customer_reviews.author: David R

customer_reviews.title: Good torch
customer_reviews.text: Have only used a few times but works great. Only issue I have is that there isn't a way to see how much butane is in.
customer_reviews.author: keira

customer_reviews.title: Built like a brick outhouse!
customer_reviews.text: Well built unit....sturdy is the word that comes to mind. For my use the fingerguard is irrelevant but can see it would provide comfort.
customer_reviews.author: JP Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Had an old torch that did NOT work well. This one works really great, very easy to control flame. Recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: Exceldas

customer_reviews.title: Nice torch
customer_reviews.text: Once I found a store that had butane, which like 5 different places, I was able to fire it up and it works as stated. So far, seems to be perfect for what I needed and priced well also.
customer_reviews.author: Fingers24

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Used to brown sugar for creme brûlée. Compact and easy to use. Great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Red tab is hard to pull.
customer_reviews.text: You have to pull the red tab before you can turn on the torch (safety feature), and the tab is TINY. It's like it was made for kids with tiny fingers or something. It's still a pretty good torch tho. I just hate using it.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Glazed Easter ham. Worked with ease. Can't wait to see what else I can use it for.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Multi use safe tool
customer_reviews.text: My wife and granddaughter grabbed this for their flow art project before I could use it in the kitchen. I bought it for its finger guard, ability to stand up, and ease of use. It’s successful use in the art studio means a delay in my review of it in the kitchen. So it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: A good little torch
customer_reviews.text: A good little torch. Use it as a light duty Bernzomatic, for sealing rope ends, soldering heavy wires etc. Does this very well
customer_reviews.author: Edward O. Wolcott

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy to use, and easy to fill. Really no need to spend the extra money on the one with the gauge unless you really want it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Torch
customer_reviews.text: Love that fact it has a safety switch that need to be push to move the knob. It’s a good torch and has a high power flame unlike other torch. If easy to handle and very light even when full.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Castro

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy Now!!
customer_reviews.text: After a negative review, Ross reached out to me via email to offer help. I still could not get the unit to fill so he sent a new unit via 2 day delivery. Got it today, it filled perfectly and works great. My thanks to Ross for making my day!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: EurKitchen Butane Culinary Kitchen Torch - Butane Fuel Not Included - Refillable Food Blow Torch for Creme Brulee and To Perfectly Sear Steak, Fish - Kitchen Lighter Tool for Cooking with Finger Guard
feature_bullets: UPGRADED MODEL - PROFESSIONAL QUALITY: Perfect for a professional chef or avid home bakers, our kitchen torch provides unmatched flame consistency and reliability; Piezo press ignition allows for fast, safe, immediate lighting.

ADJUSTABLE FLAME AND REFILLABLE: Our mini blowtorch features a gas flow regulator dial to easily adjust flame and a gas flow safety lock when turned off; the torch can create a continuous flame up to 6 inches long with a temperature of 2370°F/1300°C. Quickly refill butane torch lighter with any brand of butane (not included). Please ensure the butane canister has the LONG UNIVERSAL REFILL TIP.

COMFORT FINGER GUARD FOR SAFETY: The built in finger guard protects you from burns and extreme heat while torching and browning; torch is constructed with TUV CE certified aluminum and ABS plastic to ensure ergonomic comfort.

MULTIPLE USES: The torch is not just for the kitchen and can be used in multiple ways; it's great for sous vide, flambe, searing meat, bar cocktails, lighting a fire, cigars, dabs, BBQ grills, for camping, and for craft and artist work such as art resin.

SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: Customer satisfaction is our number one priority; if you are not fully satisfied with our micro torch or it does not perform to your expectations, please contact us for an immediate full refund or replacement.
